title: Can't craft things
body: When I click on my gemstones or my worlds tokens there's no option to craft anything. Happens when I restart as well.

replies.body: If you've already been trying to close and refresh the client and that hasn't been working, let's go ahead and try running a quick repair to see if that helps, this might just be some weird error, but definitely let me know if a repair doesn't help!

Im on EUW and tried the full repair but it didnt change anything with the current situation. You can see your items but if you click on them nothing happens. When u right click on them you are able to choose for example "Forge into Hextech Key" but when i select it nothing happens. The right side of the hextech crafting menu just stays blank. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
